mapper.select: WITH updated AS ( UPDATE payment_orders p SET status = CASE WHEN p.status IN ('CAPTURED','CAPTURE_FAILED') THEN p.status ELSE #{status, typeHandler=com.dogancaglar.paymentservice.adapter.outbound.persistence.mybatis.typehandler.PaymentOrderStatusTypeHandler} END, updated_at = GREATEST(p.updated_at, #{updatedAt}), retry_count = GREATEST(p.retry_count, #{retryCount}) WHERE p.payment_order_id = #{paymentOrderId} RETURNING p.payment_order_id, p.payment_id, p.seller_id, p.amount_value, p.amount_currency, p.status, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.retry_count ) SELECT * FROM updated
